title: Embroidery Sample, ca. 1790–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, glass, sequins, silver metallic thread, net and paper
Technique: embroidered and appliquéd on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound foundation (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral pattern embroidered with white silk, silver thread, silver sequins, clear glass, silk and satin appliqué, on a black ground patterned with blue and green dashed stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, ca. 1790–1800.
ca. 1790–1800. Medium: silk, glass, sequins, silver metallic thread, net and paper
Technique: embroidered and appliquéd on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound foundation (velvet). Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-45.
